data.name: Samurai Zero
data.detailed_description:
In Samurai Zero, the Samurai are powerful warriors capable of reshaping the future with their own two hands. Without the gods, they are the last great power left to the world and its denizens. Through their might or wit, they may either save Edo or deal the finishing blow, sending it all into chaos.

This conflict takes place in the world of Edo, where samurai are empowered with mystical abilities through the bonds they share with their diverse spirit partners. Edo was once guided by two rival gods, but their divine absence has sparked a war that threatens to tear the world apart.

Advanced Movement

Smooth and responsive means of traversal. Double jump, wall running, and dashes are all at the player's disposal to traverse dynamic maps and get the edge on their opponents.

Dynamic Combat

Discover unique forms of fighting that influence the balance of power. Complete combos with combat arts, use special abilities with Skill arts, and flourish with your character's signature Heroic Arts.

Gameplay Tactics

Customize your character's special abilities and stats to create your own custom play style. With countless combinations, you can create the perfect version of the Samurai you want to fight as.
